metadata.title: CVE-2017-9847 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The bdecode function in bdecode.cpp in libtorrent 1.1.3 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read andapplication crash) via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: libtorrent-rasterbar: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
